data.text:
List of Nigeria Postal Codes/Zip Codes For All Cities

Nigeria, situated in West Africa, is a federal republic sharing borders with Benin to the west, Chad and Cameroon to the east, and Niger to the north. Its appellation, “Nigeria,” derives from the Niger River, which delineates its southern perimeter.

Many internet websites require correct postal codes when they are collecting physical addresses. One such activity is shopping online. A valid postal code is required to send your package to the correct address.

The Nigerian postal code is organized by the Nigerian Postal Service (NIPOST). Each place has its own special code made of 6 numbers. Unlike in other countries where postal codes can have letters, in Nigeria, they only use numbers, and every code has 6 of them, no matter where it is.

According to NIPOST, Nigeria is divided into 9 regions that make up the code’s first digit. The second and third digits, combined with the first, are the dispatch district for outgoing sorting. The last three digits represent the delivery location determined by your local post office. A delivery location can be any of the following; a post office facility, a rural area, or an urban area.

To find your postcode, go ahead and make your search or click on the state and then Local Government Area (LGA) to reveal all the postal codes within that LGA; then browse through the tables to find out the postal or zip code of your exact district, ward, or location.

faq

Nigeri Postal Code faqs

What is the postal code or zip code of Nigeria?

Nigeria does not have a single postal code, but streets, villages, towns, and cities in Nigeria are divided into postal areas with their

respective postal codes.

Read more on what a postal code is HERE.

Is 23401 The postal code for Nigeria?

23401 is not a valid postal code for Nigeria. You can check through the states you want for the closest postal address to use for your online service.

What is the Nigeria state code?

PostalCode.ng has provided lists of all the codes for Nigeria’s 36 states and the FCT.

Which country uses the zip code 23401?

The zip code 23401 is associated with Keller, Virginia in the United States. It’s important not to confuse this with any postal codes in Nigeria.

What is Owerri’s postcode?

Look under Imo State in the right region of the country or use the search icon above to find the right postal code for Owerri.

Where can I find my postal code? How do I find a postal code?

You can look through the regions of the state that contains your town/city to match the respective postal code in Nigeria. Read More
